name: Shot Shifters
description:
The Bed Bards' entry for Ludem Dare 35 with the theme of "shape shift."

It's a two player versus bullet morphing shooter!

P1 Controls:

Fire - space

Move - WASD

Shift bullet type - 1, 2, 3, 4

Shift shield type - E, R, F

P2 Controls:

Fire - space

Move - JIKL / arrow keys

Shift bullet type - 7, 8, 9, 0

Shift shield type - O, P, ;
